Touch targets fixed (44px min for all buttons), responsive sidebar (90vw on mobile, 256px on desktop), mobile-optimized modals (slide from bottom), touch-friendly input area, ConfirmDialog replaces window.confirm, PWA icons added. Desktop functionality 100% preserved. All changes additive, not replacements. Ready for Phase 2 (component integration).

coreFeatures.rag: AutoReferenceButler - 626 lines of intelligent context gathering
coreFeatures.semanticSearch: RAG Search System - 602 lines with hybrid vector+keyword search
coreFeatures.embeddings: Embedding Cache - 445 lines with 80-90% hit rate
